channel.title: Rest-Apis on Eclipse hawkBit
channel.description: Recent content in Rest-Apis on Eclipse hawkBit

item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> hawkBit REST APIs DDI Root ControllerputFeedback channel for the config data actionpostFeedback channel for the DeploymentBase actionpostFeedback channel for actions waiting for confirmationpostInterface to deactivate auto-confirmation for a specific controllerpostInterface to activate auto-confirmation for a specific devicepostFeedback channel for cancel actionsgetRoot resource for an individual TargetgetReturn all artifacts of a given software module and targetgetArtifact downloadgetMD5 checksum downloadgetPreviously installed actiongetResource for software module (Deployment Base)getResource to request confirmation specific information for the controllergetConfirmation status of an actiongetCancel an actionAPI docs by RedoclyhawkBit REST APIs (v1)Download OpenAPI specification:Download

<!DOCTYPE html> hawkBit REST APIs Distribution SetsgetReturn single Distribution SetputUpdate Distribution SetdelDelete Distribution Set by IdgetReturn single meta data value for a specific key of a Distribution SetputUpdate single meta data value of a distribution setdelDelete a single meta data entry from the distribution setgetReturn all Distribution SetspostCreates new Distribution SetsgetReturn meta data for Distribution SetpostCreate a list of meta data for a specific distribution setpostInvalidate a distribution setgetReturn assigned targets to a specific distribution setpostAssigning multiple targets to a single distribution setgetReturn the assigned software modules of a specific distribution setpostAssign a list of software modules to a distribution setgetReturn Rollouts, Actions and Auto Assignments counts by Status for Distribution SetgetReturn Rollouts count by status for Distribution SetgetReturn Auto Assignments count for Distribution SetgetReturn Actions count by status for Distribution SetgetReturn installed targets to a specific distribution setgetReturn target filter queries that have the given distribution set as auto assign DSdelDelete the assignment of the software module from the distribution setTargetsgetReturn target by idputUpdate target by iddelDelete target by idgetReturn single metadata value for a specific key of a targetputUpdates a single meta data value of a targetdelDeletes a single meta data entry from a targetgetReturn action by id of a specific targetputSwitch an action from soft to forceddelCancel action for a specific targetgetReturn all targetspostCreate target(s)postAssign target type to a targetdelUnassign target type from target.
